name: Feedback Loop (Viut)
description:
Your are addicted to Tournament of Myths, you need to turn off your computer before you find a game...will you be able to turn off your computer?
Or will you fall victim to the feedback loop?

---------------------------------------------------
Tip:
If time runs our just complete the microgame to try again.
Windows can either be closed or minimized, you need to find the right choice.
Notifications can only be accepted

---------------------------------------------------
This is a small unity game with paint art we made during the weekend, it is based on our experiences with the addicting League of Legends feedback loop. The goal was to make it annoying to turn off but have fun minigames. Hope at least someone enjoys it!

---------------------------------------------------
